summary: THE DEALERSHIP SIOUX FALLS FORD HAS REFUSED TO HONOR A RECALL FOR THE FUEL LEAKAGE.  RECALL#93V125000  PH  THE CONSUMER WAS SENT A RECALL.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THEY HAD FIXED THE PROBLEM/RECALL.  THE VEHICLE WOULD NEVER RUN ON THE REAR TANK AND GASOLINE WAS POURING OUT OF THE CAP FILLER TUBE OF THE FRONT TANK.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE FRONT TANK FUEL PUMP.  THE VALVES IN BOTH FUEL PUMPS WERE BAD.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE REAR FUEL PUMP AND THE FRONT FUEL PUMP ASSEMBLY.  SCC
